With the help of [[Chōmei]], the user creates a [[wikipedia:cocoon|cocoon]] that allows them to suppress [[chakra]] [[Chakra Absorption Techniques|absorption]] from outside sources, providing additional defences at the same time. The cocoon is highly durable and can only be pierced with a [[Chakra Blade|chakra blade]], and only when hit in its weak-spot, which can be found via the [[Byakugan]].
